name: inline-blame-mini
description: Lightweight git blame information for the current cursor line

inline-blame-mini.enabled.description: Enable or disable inline blame information display

inline-blame-mini.delay.description: Delay in milliseconds before showing blame information when cursor moves

inline-blame-mini.format.description: Format template for inline blame text. Available variables: {author}, {timeAgo}, {summary}, {hash}, {prNumber}

inline-blame-mini.summaryMaxLength.description: Maximum length of commit summary before truncation

inline-blame-mini.showOnlyWhenChanged.description: Only show blame when cursor moves to a different line

inline-blame-mini.ignoreEmptyLines.description: Skip blame information for empty lines

inline-blame-mini.style.color.description: Color of the inline blame text (CSS color format)

inline-blame-mini.style.fontStyle.description: Font style of the inline blame text

inline-blame-mini.style.fontSize.description: Font size of the inline blame text (CSS font-size format)

inline-blame-mini.style.margin.description: Margin around the inline blame text (CSS margin format)

inline-blame-mini.style.position.description: Position of the inline blame text relative to the code line

inline-blame-mini.git.timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for git operations

inline-blame-mini.cache.enabled.description: Enable caching of blame results for better performance

inline-blame-mini.cache.maxSize.description: Maximum number of cached blame results

inline-blame-mini.statusBar.enabled.description: Show extension status and file context in the status bar

inline-blame-mini.excludeFiles.description: Glob patterns for files to exclude from blame information

inline-blame-mini.includeFiles.description: Glob patterns for files to include for blame information

scripts.format: bun run lint:fix && bun run prettier
scripts.vscode:prepublish: bun run lint && bun run format
